name: fantastic-css-website
description: Nuxt.js app for Fantastic CSS Website
author: Aleksander Grygier <alek@newfantastic.com>

scripts.server:start: yarn build && pm2 start npm --name fantastic-css-website -- start && yarn generate
scripts.server:restart: pm2 kill && yarn build && pm2 start npm --name fantastic-css-website -- start && yarn generate
